description: Manx Gas customers could see bills cut by 13.7% under new terms proposed by the company.
title: New Manx Gas deal could cut bills and offer refunds
title_page: New Manx Gas deal could cut bills and offer refunds - BBC News
maintext: Mr Harmer told Tynwald that Friday's announcement by the firm had been "more than a little presumptuous", as the voluntary agreement still had to be approved by the Council of Ministers before being put forward for debate by the parliament.
